name: adb-proxy
description: Portable ADB proxy for TalkBack utterance capture

scripts.build-windows: pkg adb-proxy.js --targets node18-win-x64 --out-path dist/windows && node build-platforms.js windows
scripts.build-linux: pkg adb-proxy.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --out-path dist/linux && node build-platforms.js linux
scripts.build-macos: pkg adb-proxy.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --out-path dist/macos && node build-platforms.js macos
scripts.build-all: npm run build-windows && npm run build-linux && npm run build-macos
